description:
Washington Square West is the place to be in Philadelphia! The community is just south of Independence Mall, where the signing of the U.S. Constitution took place and the home of the Liberty Bell.
Washington Square West’s square is one of five original public squares in the city. It’s a major tourist attraction, as it contains a memorial of George Washington and the Unknown Soldiers of the American Revolution. Washington Square West is adored by many because of its safe and secure streets, as well as friendly atmosphere. Jeweler Row and Antique Row are wonderful places to shop, as well as its many other small businesses.

title: Renovated One Bedroom Apartment Home, Lounge, Gym, Near Restaurants
description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as September 13, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in french ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* One bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 3rd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 315 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
2-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.

description:

The large windows face east for morning sunshine and afternoon shade and have a view looking down Walnut Street with skyscrapers to the left. The renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters! This kitchen is also fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. title: The open floor plan on the main level is perfect for entertaining
description:
This well maintained 2 bedroom, 2 bath home has a sunny open floor plan. The spacious kitchen is steps away from a designated dining area. Adjacent is the living room with plentiful windows and patio access. Out on the patio enjoy a peaceful natural setting. End your day in your private owner's suite with a large closet and roomy bath. The second bedroom is in the front of the home and next to the second full bath. There is also a laundry room off the kitchen which affords ample pantry space. Newly installed LVP flooring throughout. The HOA maintains the grounds giving you more time to enjoy the community pool and tennis courts. Near shopping, dining, medical plus Wilmington and area beaches!Situated on a quiet cul-de-sac in the heart of the prestigious Landfall community, this elegant home sits on almost a half acre with amazing views overlooking the #1 Hole of the Nicklaus Ocean Course. The lush landscaping provides great curb appeal and adds to the privacy. The interior of the home features four bedrooms, five baths, and two master suites--one on each level.
CALL US 40 84 18 17 58
The open floor plan on the main level is perfect for entertaining with one room flowing seamlessly into another and French doors and palladian windows throughout that offer abundant natural light. The kitchen offers ample prep and storage space and opens to the formal dining room and living room. Prepare to be amazed at the second-level master suite, boasting a marble bathroom with soaking tub and stand-up shower, and an entire room of closets. The second floor also has two additional bedrooms each with its own bathroom. Relax out back on the sweeping patio--complete with an in-ground plunge pool--and enjoy tranquil pond and golf course views as well as breathtaking sunrises and sunsets. The fenced backyard, an added perk is perfect for children and pets. The home is located in close proximity to the walking trail around Landfall Lake, Nicklaus Club House, driving range, and putting green. The gated golf community of Landfall offers many amenities and a fantastic location close to shopping, dining, and Millwright Beach.Whether Game Night in the den, or back patio barbeques & cornhole with family & friends in the large fenced backyard, you'll build memories for years to come. Other features include newer roof, newly repainted interior, new dishwasher, wood floors in bedrooms & front Living Room, LVP flooring in Dining area & Kitchen, smooth ceilings and screened porch. Popular schools: Holly Tree, Roland Grise & Hoggard. Such a convenient location, only moments from grocery stores, pharmacies, dining & shopping, and a short drive to UNCW, hospital, sandy beaches & Historic Downtown Wilmington! Make it your home, or use it as an investment property. Ready for immediate occupancy!Welcome to this FRESH unit listed in the wonderful community of Breezewood. This two bedroom, two bath condo has brand new LVP flooring throughout, beautiful granite in the kitchen, and new stainless steel appliances. Enjoy the open floor plan, covered balcony, and spacious bedrooms. The best of all?! The location.. 1.2 miles from the Pointe at Barclay, 10 minutes to downtown, 15 minutes to Wrightsville Beach. This low maintenance condo is a must see!
Conveniently located between Market St and I-40 off Gordon Rd, this gem offers a nearly new roof, great covered front porch, privacy fenced in and landscaped back yard. On the inside you'll find a large kitchen with granite counter tops, tile backsplash, painted cabinets, S/S appliances, large dining room and new LVP flooring throughout the entire house. This 1680sf 3 bedroom, 2 full bath, is beautifully decorated and is a must see. The Owner's suite is in the back of the home with two additional bedrooms in the front. The large living room is open and bright and super accessible to the kitchen which makes this space perfect for entertaining as well. Both the living room and Owner suite have vaulted ceilings. With plenty of open space there is room to move around freely. Wyck Farm is a quiet little community of 20 homes, low HOA dues, and a bunch of happy neighbors. Wrightsville beach, Mayfaire, Ogden, Porters Neck, ILM, numerous public parks, and I-40 are all nearby conveniences that make this home a great opportunity for the discerning buyer that doesn't want to spend half the day fighting traffic. Please see NCDOT site for more information pertaining to the Gordon Rd Improvements expansion/widening project.Beautiful brick ranch home in the desirable community of Country Haven! This home has a great open floor plan with a huge family room and open kitchen, eat in kitchen and a formal dining area, three beds, 2 baths, and a bonus! This property is loaded with great features including LVP flooring throughout the main living areas, granite counter tops, upgraded appliances, large cabinets, tile backsplash, a cozy fireplace, vaulted ceilings, a back deck, and more! The yard is a good size and fully fenced on all sides. Tucked back on a quiet cul de sac this property is in the perfect location! Conveniently located between Porters Neck and Ogden this home is convenient to Wrightsville Beach, Mayfair, and historic downtown Wilmington.Welcome to this beautiful home in the charming & desirable neighborhood of Rivers Edge! This home is tucked away in a cul-de-sac & draws you in with its beautiful landscaping. The backyard features a deck to relax after a long day or coffee to start your day, areas for gardening, or a spot to grill your favorite meals! This home has a privacy fence, beautiful new floors, quartz countertops, huge pantry,
open floor plan, vaulted ceilings in the living area, handicap accessible features, and much more! Nestled between The Pointe at Barclay and Riverlights, you're close to great restaurants & the movies. Enjoy staying active? You're minutes from a kayak launch & hiking/biking trails, this area has it all!Enjoy the beautiful North Carolina weather from the deck off the kitchen and living room area, or from the large screened porch, which has a lovely tongue and groove ceiling. The interior features hardwood flooring and a fireplace flanked by built-ins. Its mantle is charmingly repurposed from the original beam construction. The kitchen is updated with granite countertops, stainless-steel appliances (all appliances convey), and custom cabinetry. The second bedroom does not have a closet, but the seller will add one if the buyer requests. In the back yard is a detached shed/workshop that's wired with a 60 amp, 240 volt service typically needed for larger appliances and machines. A home warranty is included.One owner home just over the bridge from Carolina Beach backs up to undeveloped federal lands that contribute to the quiet and private atmosphere. The living area enjoys an unusual combination of filtered natural light, privacy and serenity; thanks in part to its high elevation and wooded landscape. Ground-level bonus room with full bath is offset from primary living area, great for office, in-laws or quiet space. This home's oversized garage has seen many years as a woodworking shop, while it remains functional as a garage it could also become a nice workout or creative space. The community is a welcome departure from the clear-cut modern subdivisions, mature trees and large variety of home styles are reminiscent of better times. The Cape HOA website says it best, ''The Cape residents enjoy in excess of seven miles of private streets, where friends and neighbors can be seen daily: walking together, walking their pets, running, bike riding and socializing outdoors. We have a quiet and beautiful community.'' The community has recently purchased adjoining building and land for clubhouse, pool and other amenities; seller has paid assessments and development is underway. This well cared for home looks forward to your visit, and welcoming its new owners to a lifestyle of possibilities.

Buy a brookie from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum.
